name: 張詠翔
objective: This course introduces students to a quantitatively oriented approach to research design and data analysis in language study, with emphasis on the construction of appropriate research designs for research in first and second language acquisition. A variety of research methods are covered in detail, including both offline and online methodologies. Basic statistical methods for experimental design are also covered.
